name: LoanPaymentCalculator
0:
”Alexa, launch payment calculator”
”what would my payment be on a ten thousand dollar sixty month loan at two percent”
”Calculate my monthly payment for a Sixty month loan for a principle amount of twenty thousand dollars at six percent”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: payment calculator
des: Calculates monthly payment for a loan if principal, term in number of months and interest rate are provided.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
